There are a variety of reviews, some of which are positive and some that are negative based on customer experience, but there are no reports or indications of fraudulent activity or scam operations. Negative reviews on sites like Yelp are not uncommon for legitimate businesses and do not necessarily indicate scam activity. I now know the final answer. Based on the accessible website status, legitimate content, valid WHOIS information, valid certificate, and absence of scam reports in search results, the URL https://www.rewmaterials.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.
